front.title: SRv6 Argument Signaling for BGP Services

abstract.t: RFC9252 defines procedures and messages for SRv6-based BGP services including L3VPN, EVPN, and Internet services. This document updates RFC9252 and provides more detailed specifications for the signaling and processing of SRv6 SID advertisements for BGP Service routes associated with SRv6 Endpoint Behaviors that support arguments.
